title: Where can I find my projects?
content: All your projects can be found in a folder named Hyper in the root of your sdcard.

title: Why is there no option to save files?
content: Files will be saved as you edit them so you do not have to worry. You can type a few characters, close the project and reopen it to test this. Your changes will be there.

title: How do I use imported files?
content: Imported files are stored in different places depending on there type. When referencing a resource it should be <resource_folder>/<resource_name>. For images the folder is named 'images', for fonts it is 'fonts', for CSS it is 'css' and for JS it is 'js'.

title: Why does feedback not work when I recompile the repo?
content: The source of Hyper is missing one file and that is Bot.java. The reason it is not included is because it contains some sensitive information (password).

title: I forgot my PIN! How do I get it back?
content: I am afraid that there is no way to get your PIN back without there being a security breach. You will need to click this and reset all the cache and data for this application. This will not delete your project files but will reset your preferences including your PIN.
